ACT
243
Deadlines for the implementation of the procedure
The notary public is obliged to carry out the entrusted procedure of the probate hearing within the time limit set by the court for this, counting from the day of receipt of the case.
In the event that the public notary, for justified reasons, fails to complete all actions within the time limit referred to in paragraph 1 of this article, he shall submit a report to the court in which he will explain the reasons for not completing the procedure.
